message: Let's split it fairly, I think this is a good starting point.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering we both get less money with each round
I'm not sure 60/40 is the best split, I was thinking more like 55/45 or 52.5/47.5?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 52/48 is a fairer split considering the decreasing value of the money.
